classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.keywords: AI, API, artificial intelligence, automation, code summary, data science, openai, python

info.name: ai-code-summary
info.summary: This project automates the process of aggregating code files from a directory into a single markdown file, ready for use in an OpenAI Assistant or any RAG model. It intelligently skips files specified in the .gitignore and leverages ChatGPT to generate concise summaries for each code file, ensuring that the final markdown file is both comprehensive and easy to understand.
